message: Can I order two margherita pizzas
Great! I found 2x Margherita on our menu for AED 31.0 each, totaling AED 62.0. Would you like to place an order for these items? Please respond with 'yes' to confirm or 'no' to cancel.
Great! To complete your order for 2x Margherita (AED 62.00), I need your NYU ID. Please provide the 8 digits after the N (e.g., if your ID is N12345678, enter 12345678):
Perfect! Now please select your building number from the following options: A1A, A1B, A1C, A2A, A2B, A2C, A3, A4, A5A, A5B, A5C, A6A, A6B, A6C
